message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $15,000 to us. Considering its worth to you, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a fantastic chance to secure a high-value item at a competitive rate. We believe this price reflects the true value and benefits the product offers you. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
